FuncDef: The update qos-profile command updates the QoS profile that is applied to users.
CLIs: update qos-profile user-id <user-id> profile <qos-profile-name> { inbound | outbound }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of a user.
For the NE40E-X3, NE40E-X8 and NE40E-X16:The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 3145727.

Specifies the name of a QoS profile.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters.

Updates the QoS profile for the incoming traffic of users.
-

Updates the QoS profile for the outgoing traffic of users.
-

Examples: [~HUAWEI-aaa] update qos-profile user-id 100 profile test inbound
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Running the update qos-profile command allows you to modify the QoS profile that is applied to users when they are online. After this command is run, the QoS profile that is applied to online users is replaced by the newly modified one.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
The update qos-profile command cannot be configured if a flow queue in four-flow-queue mode is configured in the specified profile.
The command cannot be configured while the qos-profile is in time-range mode.
The command cannot be configured while the qos-profile is in 8cos-enhance mode.
